title: Machine Learning Software Development Engineer
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Optimize deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch for AMD GPUs.
- Develop and optimize GPU kernels for AI operations.
- Collaborate with internal teams to enhance training and inference performance.
- Engage with open-source maintainers for code integration.
- Optimize performance in multi-GPU and multi-node systems.
- Apply software engineering best practices for maintainable solutions.
- Mentor junior team members through guidance and code reviews.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Expertise in C++ and advanced analytical skills in Linux.
- Proven experience in GPU kernel development and optimization.
- Strong knowledge of AMD architectures and low-level programming.
- Proficiency in Python and performance tuning.
- Extensive experience in technical software development and GPU optimization.
- Master’s or PhD in Computer Science or related field.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Deep learning frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch.
- GPU programming: HIP, CUDA, assembly (ASM).
- Compiler technologies: LLVM, ROCm.
- Performance optimization tools: Compute Kernel (CK), CUTLASS, Triton.
- High-performance computing environments and resource optimization.

title: Sr. Product Marketing Manager
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Develop positioning and messaging for PC and graphics software.
- Manage launch claims and value propositions for new platforms.
- Collaborate with engineering and product teams for customer benefits.
- Lead go-to-market execution across marketing and PR channels.
- Analyze market trends and competitor offerings for strategy refinement.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.
- Experience in product marketing or management in relevant industries.
- Strong understanding of PC software stack and performance optimization.
- Proven ability to craft compelling messaging for diverse audiences.
- Excellent communication skills to simplify complex technology.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- PC software stack, including drivers and firmware.
- Graphics acceleration and software frameworks.
- Operating systems: Windows and Linux.

title: Product Manager - Network Infrastructure
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Lead product roadmap for networking infrastructure and GPU clusters.
- Design and implement network solutions for HPC and GPU applications.
- Collaborate with engineering teams on network architecture requirements.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 7+ years in network product management or technical leadership.
- Experience with networking technologies like TCP/IP and Ethernet.
- Strong understanding of AI/ML networking challenges and solutions.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- High-speed networking protocols (e.g., RDMA, Infiniband).
- Cloud service providers (AWS, GCP, Azure) for GPU infrastructure.
- High-performance networks for AI and HPC workloads.

title: Customer Operations Account Manager
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Review customer backlogs and resolve issues with stakeholders.
- Manage product lifecycle stages from NPI to EOL.
- Oversee inventory to minimize costs and optimize supply.
- Monitor demand vs. supply profiles for customers.
- Drive key projects and provide strategic advice.
- Engage customers through regular business reviews.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Strong supply chain and project management knowledge.
- Excellent problem-solving and solution implementation skills.
- Proficient in executive communications and presentations.
- Strong analytical skills for managing dependencies.
- Ability to adapt to change and uncertainty.
- Experience with data center customers preferred.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Proficiency in Excel and PowerPoint.
- Experience with Power BI for data analysis.
- Familiarity with supply chain management tools.

title: GPU Product Manager for Gaming and AI
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Define product strategy and roadmap for Radeon GPUs and software.
- Develop market and product requirements based on customer feedback.
- Collaborate with teams to prioritize features and manage trade-offs.
- Drive feature definition for gaming and AI workflows.
- Lead go-to-market planning with marketing and sales teams.
- Own business outcomes and track KPIs for product performance.
- Represent product in customer meetings and executive reviews.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Strong technical understanding of GPU architectures and graphics pipelines.
- Proven experience in go-to-market planning and lifecycle management.
- Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
- Data-driven mindset with proficiency in market analysis.
- Several years of product management experience in relevant domains.
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field; Master's preferred.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- GPU architectures and graphics APIs (DirectX/Vulkan/OpenGL).
- AI workloads and content creation pipelines.
- Performance testing tools and benchmarking methodologies.
